analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/14/0x68350d30d9f58c81aaaa41929f1bfc52fff4ea49.sol:
	Contract CrowdSale has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/14/0x68350d30d9f58c81aaaa41929f1bfc52fff4ea49.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/14/0x68350d30d9f58c81aaaa41929f1bfc52fff4ea49.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/14/0x68350d30d9f58c81aaaa41929f1bfc52fff4ea49.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/14/0x68350d30d9f58c81aaaa41929f1bfc52fff4ea49.sol#74-75) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_tokenAddress' of CrowdSale.CrowdSale (/unique_chucks/14/0x68350d30d9f58c81aaaa41929f1bfc52fff4ea49.sol#119-120) is not in mixedCase
